Reviews.Title: Out of BUSINESS!!!
Reviews.Author: D. Sabbagh
Reviews.Content: Agfa Photo/GE Selecta Cameras made or distributed by Red Dot imaging are no longer distributed in AmericaWarranty appears to be available a little while longerThese cameras do have some issues and buying one now will be at your riskRed Dot Imaging has CEASED operationsGo to the Red Dot imaging website. Amazon apparently blocks URl's in their reviewsThese were great cameras but this will render them useless for warranty or support

Reviews.Title: Impressive , inexpensive camera .
Reviews.Author: C. steward
Reviews.Content: WOW ! I bought one for my wifes birthday gift , and I was so impressed with the features and easy operation . I bought one for myself . I really like the electronic view finder . This low priced little cam is sturdily built and all controls clearly marked . ( My wife loves hers too ! ) I have several cameras , but this is my new and current fave .

Reviews.Title: AGPHOTO SELECTA 16
Reviews.Author: bromeliad
Reviews.Content: GOOD VALUE CAMERA THAT IS VERY EASY TO USE, BRILLIANT CLARITY THAT YOU WOULD EXPECT FROM A HIGH PRICE CAMERA.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Melissa Raudenbush "melissa"
Reviews.Content: Very good camera . My first dslr. Still have yet to figure out manual mode otherwise it would get a 5 star.

Reviews.Title: Not a great camera
Reviews.Author: Lynchphile "LYNCHPHILE"
Reviews.Content: All things considered, the camera is a bit bulky and there are focusing issues.  The one good thing about it is that it takes regular AA batteries so you don't have to schlep an extra battery charger around!  But unfortunately, this is not an especially portable camera.  More portable than an D-SLR, but not something that will fit in your pocket.

ProductInfo.Features:
16 Megapixel 15x Wide Zoom
2.7" Auto brightness LCD Image Stabilization
Face Smile and Blink Detection Red Eye Removal
Pan Capture Panorama
3D software and 3D Glasses Included
ProductInfo.Name: AGFAPHOTO Selecta 16 Burgundy 16 MP Digital Camera with 15x Optical Zoom
